mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking ( shop_id, customer_id, booking_datetime, shop_menu_id, hairdresser_id, progress, booking_way, memo ) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{customerId}, #{bookingDatetime}, #{shopMenuId}, #{hairdresserId}, #{progress}, #{bookingWay}, #{memo} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.criteria_datetime AS booking_datetime, b.customer_id, b.my_booking_or_not, IF(b.progress=10, 'N', 'Y') AS assigned_or_not, c.name AS customer_name, c.phone_number AS customer_phone_number, b.hairdresser_id, h.nickname hairdresser_name, sm.name AS service_name, b.service_expect_begin_datetime, b.service_expect_end_datetime, b.memo FROM ( SELECT shop_id, customer_id, IF(customer_id=IFNULL(#{customerId},0),IFNULL(service_expect_begin_datetime, booking_datetime), service_expect_begin_datetime) AS criteria_datetime, IF(customer_id=IFNULL(#{customerId},0),'Y', 'N') AS my_booking_or_not, shop_menu_id, hairdresser_id, service_expect_begin_datetime, service_expect_end_datetime, progress, memo FROM booking ) b INNER JOIN customer c ON b.customer_id = c.id INNER JOIN hairdresser h ON b.hairdresser_id = h.id LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_menu sm ON b.shop_menu_id = sm.id WHERE b.shop_id = #{shopId} AND b.progress IN ( 10, 30 ) /* 신청, 접수 */ AND b.criteria_datetime BETWEEN #{fromDateTime} AND #{toDateTime} ORDER BY b.criteria_datetime ASC
SELECT booking_progress_id, name FROM booking_progress_language WHERE language_id = #{languageId}
